text: CBS Morning News is an early morning television program on CBS. It is hosted by Anne-Marie Green. The program debuted on October 4, 1982 as the CBS Early Morning News. It was renamed to CBS Morning News. The program airs live at 4:00 a.m. Eastern, but on some stations it airs at 4:30 a.m. Eastern. ==References== Category:American television news programs Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: CBS Morning News
